topic.title: crypto
topic.body: How many people track the rise and fall of value in crypto currency? i have been for a few years now and been doing trades on behalf of quite a few people (i manage investments for around 40 people) and i must admit in the last few months alot of people have made alot of money  unfortunately with my 0.5% fee i charge its not alot for me but it helps fund my hobby. but with the current rise in crypto prices. anyone else been following mastercards attempt to accept crypto? the issiue they are facing is the anti-money laundering laws however there are a coupple coins that has set a goal to meet these government regulations and i would expect the value of these coins to go up significantly over the next 1-3 years. so the question is, what is going to be the next big thing in the crypto world?
